text: The 1980–81 Algerian Championnat National was the 19th season of the Algerian Championnat National since its establishment in 1962. A total of 15 teams contested the league, with JE Tizi-Ouzou as the defending champions, The Championnat started on September 5, 1980. and ended on June 12, 1981. ==Team summaries== === Promotion and relegation === Teams promoted from Algerian Division 2 1980–1981 * ISM Aïn Béïda * USK Alger * Chlef SO Teams relegated to Algerian Division 2 1981–1982 * CN Batna * ESM Guelma ==League table== ==Season statistics== ===Top scorers=== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |- !Rank !Scorer !Club !Goals |- !|1 |align="left"| Noureddine Meghichi |align="left"|RS Kouba | style="text-align:center;"|16 |- !|2 |align="left"| Salah Assad |align="left"|RS Kouba | style="text- align:center;"|15 |- !|3 |align="left"| Nasser Bouiche |align="left"|MP Alger | style="text-align:center;"|14 |} ==References== ==External links== *1980–81 Algerian Championnat National Algerian Championnat National Championnat National Category:Algerian Ligue Professionnelle 1 seasons
title: 1980–81 Algerian Championnat National
